title: Lotta on Troublemaker Street
description: Poor Lotta is having a very bad day. First, she wakes up mad because in her dream her older brother and sister were mean to her. Then, Mother expects her to wear a sweater that "scratches and tickles." Madder than ever, Lotta decides to run away and find a new place to live. After all, everyone at her house is mean, so she won't miss her family at all -- will she?  This hilarious and authentic look at a very bad day in the life of a very spunky five-year-old is sure to resonate with every reader.
author: Astrid Lindgren
